ProductInfo.Features:
GW8608H: Professional 8 Channel H.264 DVR, iPhone, Android Viewing. HDMI & VGA. 16 bit true color graphical menu interface; embedded real-time Linux operation system. Preview, record, playback, backup, network surveillance. USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW810CP: 1/3" SONY CCD Small Pinhole Camera, 425TV line. You Can Virtually Hide it Anywhere. Dimension: 35.5mm/35.5mm. Super Low 0.5Lux Works Great In Low Light
GW726W: 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 520 TV lines, 26 IR LEDs. 3.6mm Len for Wide Angle View. Metal vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes:     GW8608H DVR with 2TB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     4 x GW810CP - 1/3" SONY CCD Indoor Camera;     4 x GW726W - 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor Camera;
1 x GW125CAW: 125 feet pre-made cable BNC; 2 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC; 4 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x 12V5A Power Supply for Security Cameras; 1 x 1 to 8 Power Splitter Adapter Cable.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 8CHV6 8Ch H.264 DVR with 4 x SONY CCD Small Pinhole Camera and 4 x Sony CCD dome camera Surveillance Package, Free LED Monitor (Black/White)
